java/liquibase/DatabaseChangeLog.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00005 import liquibase.exception.ValidationFailedException;
00006 import liquibase.parser.ChangeLogIterator;
00007 import liquibase.parser.filter.DbmsChangeSetFilter;
00008 import liquibase.parser.visitor.ValidatingVisitor;
00009 import liquibase.preconditions.AndPrecondition;
00010 
00011 import java.util.ArrayList;
00012 import java.util.List;
00013 
00017 public class DatabaseChangeLog implements Comparable<DatabaseChangeLog> {
00018     private AndPrecondition preconditions;
00019     private String physicalFilePath;
00020     private String logicalFilePath;
00021 
00022     private List<ChangeSet> changeSets = new ArrayList<ChangeSet>();
00023 
00024     public DatabaseChangeLog(String physicalFilePath) {
00025         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public AndPrecondition getPreconditions() {
00029         return preconditions;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public void setPreconditions(AndPrecondition precond) {
00033         preconditions = precond;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getPhysicalFilePath() {
00037         return physicalFilePath;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setPhysicalFilePath(String physicalFilePath) {
00041         this.physicalFilePath = physicalFilePath;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getLogicalFilePath() {
00045         if (logicalFilePath == null) {
00046             return physicalFilePath;
00047         }
00048         return logicalFilePath;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setLogicalFilePath(String logicalFilePath) {
00052         this.logicalFilePath = logicalFilePath;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getFilePath() {
00056         if (logicalFilePath == null) {
00057             return physicalFilePath;
00058         } else {
00059             return logicalFilePath;
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063     public String toString() {
00064         return getFilePath();
00065     }
00066 
00067     public int compareTo(DatabaseChangeLog o) {
00068         return getFilePath().compareTo(o.getFilePath());
00069     }
00070 
00071 
00072     public List<ChangeSet> getChangeSets() {
00073         return changeSets;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public void addChangeSet(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00077         this.changeSets.add(changeSet);
00078     }
00079 
00080     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00081         if (this == o) return true;
00082         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00083 
00084         DatabaseChangeLog that = (DatabaseChangeLog) o;
00085 
00086         return getFilePath().equals(that.getFilePath());
00087 
00088     }
00089 
00090     public int hashCode() {
00091         return getFilePath().hashCode();
00092     }
00093 
00097     public void validate(Database database) throws LiquibaseException {
00098 
00099         ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(this, new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00100 
00101         ValidatingVisitor validatingVisitor = new ValidatingVisitor(database.getRanChangeSetList());
00102         validatingVisitor.checkPreconditions(database, this);
00103         logIterator.run(validatingVisitor);
00104 
00105         if (!validatingVisitor.validationPassed()) {
00106             throw new ValidationFailedException(validatingVisitor);
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110 }
